title: Gammadda Smiles intitative continues
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); For many people of Sri Lanka, life has become increasingly difficult.
Mounting problems continue to affect their lives ahead of tomorrow’s new year festival.
Hundreds of people are in queues even at present to purchase bare essentials in many areas.
However, for Sri Lankans, the rising issues have never snatched away from their quality of sharing and empathy.
Gammadda has taken the initiative to distribute food provisions amongst as many of these families as possible.
The objective is to keep as many people as possible happy for the Sinhala and Tamil New Year festivals.
